project.name: SaaS template Setup
project.description: Setup guide for the no-code SaaS template with multi-tenancy, RLS, and cloud-only deployment.

tasks.title: MCP Configuration (Supabase & Clerk)
tasks.description: Set up MCP tools for cloud development (Supabase MCP, Clerk MCP, GitHub MCP).

subtasks.title: Configure Supabase MCP
subtasks.description: Set up Supabase MCP for database management. You need your Supabase project URL and anon key from your manually created Supabase project.

subtasks.title: Configure Clerk MCP
subtasks.description: Set up Clerk MCP for authentication management. You need your Clerk API keys from your manually created Clerk project.

subtasks.title: Configure GitHub MCP
subtasks.description: Set up GitHub MCP for repository management.

tasks.title: Create Supabase Project Manually
tasks.description: Create a new Supabase project via the supabase.com dashboard. Copy the project URL and anon key, which will be used for MCP and environment variables.

subtasks.title: Create Supabase Project
subtasks.description: Create the project in the Supabase dashboard.

subtasks.title: Copy Project URL and Anon Key
subtasks.description: Locate and save the Supabase project URL and anon key.

subtasks.title: Configure Database Schema
subtasks.description: Set up the database schema with RLS policies (follow the guides).

tasks.title: Create Clerk Project Manually
tasks.description: Create a new Clerk project via the clerk.com dashboard. Copy the API keys, which will be used for MCP and environment variables.

subtasks.title: Create Clerk Project
subtasks.description: Create the project in the Clerk dashboard.

subtasks.title: Copy Clerk API Keys
subtasks.description: Locate and save the Clerk API keys.

subtasks.title: Configure User Roles
subtasks.description: Set up user roles (super_admin, company_admin, company_user, customer).

tasks.title: Final Verification
tasks.description: Verify all components are working correctly.

subtasks.title: Test Database Access
subtasks.description: Verify Supabase connection and RLS policies.

tasks.title: Documentation Review
tasks.description: Review and understand the template documentation.

subtasks.title: Read Setup Guides
subtasks.description: Review all setup guides in the /docs folder.

subtasks.title: Understand Business Rules
subtasks.description: Review business rules and multi-tenancy setup.

subtasks.title: Review Troubleshooting Guide
subtasks.description: Familiarize yourself with common issues and solutions.
